Genadi Kvikvinia.style_conflict: Genadi plans to use his signature move and overpower Michael.

Michael Todd.strength: Strong and powerful, but Genadi believes he can overpower him.
Michael Todd.health: Recovered from bicep surgery, but Genadi doubts his elbow will hold up.

Michael Todd.style_conflict: Michael plans to keep Genadi subdued and prevent him from gaining confidence.

Genadi Kvikvinia.strength: Strong and versatile, but Michael believes he hasn't felt his level before.

Genadi Kvikvinia.previous_match_summary: Genadi has a strong record, but Michael is confident in his own progress.
